## RuneTreeManager class

A rune trees manager - to fetch and manage rune trees data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RuneTreeManager implements BaseManager<RuneTree> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[RuneTree](./shieldbow.runetree.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, cacheSettings)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager._constructor_.md) |  | Create a new rune trees manager. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [RuneTree](./shieldbow.runetree.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of the rune trees cached in the memory. |
|  [cachedRunes](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.cachedrunes.md) |  | [Rune](./shieldbow.rune.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of runes that have been saved in the cache.<!-- -->This is similar to the cache but the cache is a collection of Rune Trees and this is an array of runes. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager belongs to. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(key, options)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetch a rune tree by its key. The key is the same as the rune tree's name, for example - <code>Domination</code>. |
|  [fetchRune(key, options)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.fetchrune.md) |  | Fetch a rune by its key. The key is mostly the same as the rune name, for example - <code>Electrocute</code>. |
|  [findById(id)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.findbyid.md) |  | Find a rune tree by its numerical ID. |
|  [findByName(name)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.findbyname.md) |  | Find a rune tree by its name. The search is case-insensitive. The special characters are NOT ignored. |
|  [findRuneById(id)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.findrunebyid.md) |  | Find a rune by its numerical ID. |
|  [findRuneByName(name)](./shieldbow.runetreemanager.findrunebyname.md) |  | Find a rune by its name. The search is case-insensitive. The special characters are not ignored. |
